Name: My Escort Company
About the game: START YOUR OWN ESCORT COMPANY! My Escort Company is a management game where you create your company, make money and hire girls! Welcome to Dream City! CURRENT EARLY ALPHA CONTENT 3 girls to hire! Escort (basic): answer escort requests and start making money! 2 different places available! Few previews of the soon available content for each available girls! Translation system: super very experimental community made translation! EXTRA: Meet the amazing KimmySun! Our special guest and your advisor in game! WHAT'S COMING NEXT We will try to update the game on a very regular basis and add one new girl every month while including the community in our choices (which girl would you prefer to be integrated, which places, which kinks, more content to unlock or extra gameplay etc...). At least 11 girls + 1 bonus for Patrons. Improve the escort system! A one to one chat with each girls to better know her and their background, extras to unlock! Big gallery of pictures AND animations for each girls. A lot of different places for the dates but also for extra non-work activities with the girls (karaoke, spa...) Shops to buy items and buildings to improve your girls stats. The player office: upgrade it, improve it, customize it. Streamer mode with all 18+ words replaced and 18+ content hidden! And more with your suggestions!
